short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LimiTube helps to limit daily usage to websites. It's great for kids and the easily distractible.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LimiTube helps to limit daily usage to websites. It was originally created for a kid that spent way too much time on YouTube, but it will work on other sites as well. Simply add the first part of any URL, and if LimiTube detects a match when the page first loads, a timer will start based on that site's configuration.

** Release Notes **
0.1-0.3 * This is the initial release
0.4 * Added additional icons
